user_instruction: 'Tell Jane to send me (contact@medtechsolutions.com) an update about Greenleaf Health Center’s needs for the upcoming software update, and remind her she can review her Gmail and Notion for the necessary information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Request for Update on Software Needs

Hi Jane,

I hope you’re doing well. Could you please send me an update on Greenleaf Health Center’s operational needs for the upcoming software update at your earliest convenience? You can reach me at contact@medtechsolutions.com.

Feel free to review your Gmail and Notion workspaces for any details that will help compile the information.

Thank you so much for your assistance!

Best regards,  
[Your Name]  
MedTech Solutions

final_output:
